front.title: RIFT Keys Structure and Well-Known Registry in Key Value TIE

abstract.t: Routing in Fat-Trees RIFT [RIFT] allows for key/value pairs to be advertised within Key-Value Topology Information Elements (KV TIEs). The data contained within these KV TIEs can be used for any imaginable purpose. This document defines the various Key Types (i.e. Well-Known, OUI, and Experimental) and a method to structure corresponding values.
